name: Lenz Lithium Battery Pack rcB 1200
description: Add some power to your Lenz products to keep you warm on cold-weather adventures. This lithium pack provides up to 14 hours of heat for your Heat Socks, Vest, Heat Gloves 4.0 and Heat Mitts 4.0 (sold separately).Rechargeable lithium-ion battery powers your Lenz heat products for up to 14 hours.Connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth for wireless adjustability (Lenz heat app required).Single-button design lets you cycle through 3 different heat settings.Includes USB charger and cord.Sold as a pair.Compatible with Lenz Heat Socks, Vest and Heat Gloves/Mitts 4.0.
